sermons.title: Be Still
sermons.description:
Be still and know that I am God. I will be exalted among the nations. I will be exalted in the earth! Psalm 46:10

In this world of constant noise
We never take the time to rest
And though words can’t say enough
Sometimes silence says it best

Speak to us with words that pierce our hearts

Chorus
We will be still and know that You are God (3x)
You are God

When we ask You for Your wisdom
And we expect a strong reply
You just ask us for our silence
As we lift Your name up high

Speak to us with words that break our hearts

Chorus

And I know that words could never say enough
To thank You for what You’ve done for us
(Repeat 3x)

In this world of constant noise
We never take the time to rest
And since words can’t say enough
Sometimes silence says it best

Speak to us with words that pierce our hearts

Chorus

sermons.title: Ever-Present Help In The Time Of Trouble
sermons.description: Ps. 46:1 says our God is our refuge and strength, an ever present help in time of trouble. He is available to us any time, day or night. He's continually watching over his own, willing to speak to us and guide us. THe Bible tells us that Christ himself is in us, and we are in him. We have been given great and precious promises that we might partake of his divine nature (2 Pet. 1:4). In trouble, God is there, and in peaceful times, God is there. What comfort in these perilous times! An uplfting message for those in trials and tribulation.

sermons.title: Great Faith Over Great Fear - Psalm 46
Jehovah Shammah - The Lord is There
sermons.description: Ezekiel sees a vision of the glory of the Lord reluctantly departing from his idolatrous people and is grieved. Where the presence of the Lord is, there is a melting. It is dangerous to go to a church where the minister spends more time pursuing worldly methods, rather than spending time with God.

sermons.title: The Devil's Twins - Fret and Fear
sermons.description: Scripture says in the last days evil men will wax worse and worse, and often the righteous are enflamed with anger when they see and hear of the wickedness perpetrated against the innocent, such as abortion. Bro. Wilkerson illustrates through the life of David in the scriptures how not to react to the wickedness of men when you are angry, in the flesh. We need to learn to stand in the gap in intercession and not fear what is coming on the earth in these last days, because the Lord will keep his own secure.

sermons.title: The Revelation Of Christ In Life
sermons.description: Ed Miller dissects the "noisiest psalm in the Bible" to show true spiritual mindedness knows the secret of a panic free life.  "Is God in control?  Is He in remote control?" he asks.  Not at all, but the God of Jacob is a very present help in time of trouble.
